MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL22 postcode area of Towyn, affecting properties in Maes Rhosyn, Towyn Way West and surrounding streets.  This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:26PM on 22nd November 2020
